abstract: virat kohli , anushka sharma respond to srk 's wedding wish .
article: virat & anushka . the wedding bells finally rang for the most eligible bachelor of india , virat kohli , and the gorgeous bollywood diva anushka sharma . the two tied the knot in traditional indian style at milan , italy on december 11 , 2017 . the good wishes came in pouring for the the newly-wed couple from all corners . the cricketers lined up to wish virat and anushka . even the biggest celebrities of the b-town were not far either in sending their good regards for ` virushka ' , as the couple is popularly known among their fans .

the list of celebrities who took to micro blogging site twitter to wish virat and anushka had the name of king khan , shah rukh khan as well . arguably the finest actor of his generation , shah rukh shares great bond with anushka sharma . incidentally , anushka had made her bollywood debut in the shah rukh khan-starrer movie , ` rab ne bana di jodi ' , in the year 2008 . the movie was a big hit at the box office and since then , there has been no looking back for the lovely lady . data-ad-client = `` ca-pub-7785168419440214 `` data-ad-slot = `` 6042301080 '' > it was not surprising to see srk lining up to wish virat and anushka .

he wished the couple in the wittiest way possible using the most perfect words . `` ab yeh hui na real rab ne bana di jodi . my love to both @anushkasharma & @imvkohli may god bless u with happiness & health , '' shah rukh khan had tweeted . ab yeh hui na real rab ne bana di jodi . my love to both @anushkasharma & @imvkohli may god bless u with happiness & health pic . twitter . com/ymst2ay9fh -- shah rukh khan december 11 , 2017 . virushka respondvirat was quick to acknowledge the wedding wish .

it seems the couple has found time to reply back to the well wishers . earlier , virat and anushka had responded to shahid afridi 's tweet as well . `` haha thank you for the lovely wishes shah rukh bhai , '' virat kohli wrote in his reply to shah rukh khan . haha thank you for the lovely wishes shah rukh bhai . 😊 -- virat kohli december 13 , 2017 . couple of hours prior to virat 's reply , srk received a reply from anushka too . anushka thanked her first co-star in the b-town .

she will be working in a project with srk next year as well . `` haha ! thank you so much @iamsrk , '' tweeted anushka sharma . haha ! thank you so much @iamsrk 🙏 😊 ❤ -- anushka sharma december 13 , 2017 . the post virat kohli , anushka sharma respond to srk 's wedding wish appeared first on crictracker .
